app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bashkir, Belarussian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Burmese, Bosnian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), English, Esperanto, Estonian, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lao, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Scots, Singhalese, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakutian, Yiddish, Zulu.

Чем сильно приложение:

— Все билеты ПДД доступны бесплатно.

— Работа над ошибками по билету.
— Добавление вопросов в избранное.
— Работает и без Интернета сразу с телефона.
— Приложение учит сдавать экзамен и знать правила. 

Получи права с приложением ПДД 2025/2026 от Дрома
Знай правила дорожного движения и забудь про штрафы.

Проверять гос номер авто важно перед покупкой машины.

Приложение «Номерограм» позволяет найти историю продаж и отдельные фото машины в Интернете по гос номеру. Пробить по гос номеру авто у нас можно бесплатно.

Установите «Номерограм». Введите в поиск гос номер, и мы найдём вам историю продажи машины или отдельные её фото из Интернета. Покажем даты размещения объявления, цену и пробег.

В нашей базе свыше 25 000 000 номеров. Фотографии в «Номерограм» приходят как от людей (можно добавить фото машины с гос номером через приложение), так и с досок объявлений, социальных сетей и других сайтов. Всё из открытых источников.

«Номерограм» найдёт для вас по гос номеру:

Пробег автомобиля.

Если автомобиль ранее размещался на авито, автору, дром и т.д., мы найдём его фотографии и покажем пробег, который указал продавец в объявлении. Наша база непрерывно пополняется. 

Цена машины.

Также мы сможем показать вам цену машины. А если она продавалась несколько раз, то вы сможете увидеть историю изменения цены. Это полезная информация, которая поможет вам поторговаться.

Город продажи.

Мы можем находить не только пробеги и цены, но и города продажи автомобиля. Всегда интересно узнать, где бегала машина ранее. 

Фото ДТП и ремонтов.

«Номерограм» мониторит не только доски объявлений, но и другие ресурсы. Поиск по номеру может помочь вам увидеть фото ДТП или процесс ремонта автомобиля.

Ещё вы можете по фото выяснить, что машина бегала в такси.

Несколько показательных примеров:

Скрутил 100 000 километров пробега — А 774 СО 716
Жёсткое ДТП, машину восстановили — А 714 НТ 38
Была в ДТП и работала в такси — Т 146 УС 56
Бесславный конец японской гонки — О 461 ЕА 125

И это не всё!

Мы хотим сделать мир лучше и помочь покупателям подержанных машин. Всё-таки приятно подстраховать себя перед покупкой авто, а не играть в лотерею. Для этого «Номерограм» и сделан.

Добавляйте фото машин с гос номерами в «Номерограм» и радости в жизни прибавится!

PlantAI is the most up-to-date AI plant care assistant using cutting-edge technology. The app helps you to get answers to your plant-related queries directly, but the usage isn't limited to that. You can identify any unknown plant species, diagnose your plant, and get professional plant care guides.

With PlantAI, you will be able to satisfy your plant curiosity anywhere anytime within seconds. You will get detailed plant information like its name, characteristics, and toxicity. Moreover, this app offers you hands-on planting and growing tips like water, fertilize, mist, clean, and repot.

Try the most trending AI plant chatbot to explore a bigger world of plants today!

Key features:
Get instant replies to any plant questions
Plant identification with high accuracy
Auto-diagnose plant health problems and get corresponding solutions
Expert-level plant care tips to help your greenery grow better
Give likes to the conversation

Learn Salah/Namaz from scratch, memorize surahs of the Quran, learn Dua, and check prayer times. Suitable for beginners.

What is Namaz?
Namaz is the daily muslim prayer, also known as Salat or Salah. It is one of the five pillars of Islam and the best way of worshipping Allah the Almighty.

Description:
This app is an audio player for you to listen to the correct pronunciation of the prayers in Arabic. It will help you to learn the dua-invocations and parts of the Quran that are read inside the prayer. You will also have the texts in English transliteration and some illustrations to help you navigate through the process. All content is in accordance with the rules of the Hanafi school of law.

Important to understand, that this is a companion app, and it is not sufficient to fully learn the prayer on its own. We also strongly recommend that you learn to read Arabic, as English letters and phonemes are not sufficient to convey all sounds found in Arabic. Learning to read Arabic will allow you to perform your prayers in the best way and will give you access to the Holy Quran. The easiest and most effective way to learn both prayer and reading Arabic is to find a good teacher.

Attribution:
- Prayer images were kindly provided by the Muslim web portal Azan.kz
- Prayer times are fetched from the open API of Aladhan.com
- The Charity elements icon pack used in the "Support us" module was created by Eucalyp - Flaticon (https://www.flaticon.com/packs/charity-elements-4)
- The Calendar icon  used in the "Recurring Donation" screen was created by Freepik - Flaticon (https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/year)

developer: HEYOS YAZILIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
Break Language Barriers Instantly with AI Translator – Your Live, Real-Time Translation Companion


Speak, scan, and translate now—anytime, anywhere—with Translate AI, the ultimate AI translator for everyday communication, travel, business, and learning. Whether you’re navigating a new country, chatting with friends abroad, or closing international deals, this powerful live translator is designed to help you understand and be understood.
With cutting-edge AI for translation, Translate AI offers real-time voice and audio translator tools, camera-based AI image translation, text translation, and an offline phrasebook—all in one sleek app. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to seamless, global conversations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Voice & Audio Translator
Experience fluent, two-way communication with our live voice translator. Speak naturally and get instant results with our AI auto translate engine. Perfect for business, travel, and everyday use.

AI Camera & Photo Translator

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

AI Text Translator

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.
Translate Audio with Ease
The built-in audio translator makes spoken communication fast and fluid. Great for meetings, voice memos, or casual conversation.
Supports Over 100 Languages
From English, Spanish, and French to Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, and more, Translate AI gives you access to over 100 supported languages.
Offline Phrasebook
 Save key phrases and access them even without the internet. Your must-have tool for travelers and emergencies.
Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI
 Our app uses advanced AI quick translate technology that adapts to your tone and context. It’s like having an intelligent interpreter in your pocket.

Why Choose Translate AI?

Fast and intuitive ai translator for speech, text, and images
All-in-one live translator with voice, camera, and typing options
Translate now with zero delays or complications
Ideal ai chat translator for everyday conversations and social apps
Innovative auto translator that learns your language patterns
Seamless UI designed for fast access and efficiency


Use Cases:

Travel: Navigate new places with confidence. Use your live translator to understand signs, menus, or directions instantly.

Business: Make global communication effortless in meetings and negotiations with your reliable ai translator.

Learning: Boost your language learning with ai quick translate tools and real-life examples.
Daily Communication: Use the ai chat translator for texting, social media, or online content in any language.

On-the-Go: Rely on the camera and image translator to understand foreign packaging, documents, or signage.
Whether you’re learning a new language, traveling the globe, or connecting across cultures, Translate AI is the smartest way to speak fluently and confidently. With our built-in AI for translation, you can say what you mean and understand what others say—without delay.

Break the language barrier. Speak freely. Translate now.
Download AI Translator - Translate AI today and explore the world with confidence.

House Building for Minecraft is perfect for building minecraft house on your map. It has tons of buildings for minecraft 1.20 and minecraft 1.21+ and famous structures addons. Easily import, export, and edit your minecraft building in one click.

House Building for Minecraft has a huge variety of structures minecraft 1.20 1.21+ doesn't need to pay, all structures will be built in 3 ways depending on your preferences for building in Minecraft world. In particular, you can add Chest & Mob Spawner Naturally into minecraft house. Besides, you can create pixel art for minecraft with any picture from your mobile phone. You can easily modify the position and preview 3D visual minecraft house building or pixel art.

Suggestions for minecraft house builder can be flexible in the 3 ways to build a house below:
- Option 1: Place Building Blocks Minecraft, then select a house in the menu building minecraft.
- Option 2: 1. Activate the auto-spawning feature; all structures will be automatically constructed in the biome mcpe of your choice.
- Option 3: Copy or remember "name function", and type this command: "/function name function".
***We have prepared a minecraft building guide in the settings.

Building minecraft houses has never been easier. Are you ready to start minecraft build ideas and putting unique structures in your MCPE world?

FEATURES
- Variety Structures & Addons: Automatically update minecraft buildings from small to large size according to categories: houses, modern houses, medieval, boats, castles, temples,...
- Intuitive Minecraft Building Tools: Structures, chest, mob spawner, and pixel art are visually previewed in 3D. Support menu selector builds minecraft house, auto spawning house by biome selected, and put chest/entities by coordinates.
- ADD CHEST: Add any entity to structures that minecraft builder using CHEST such as furniture, armor, weapons, or food.
- ADD SPAWNER: You can add Minecraft Mob Spawner with any mobs. Easily search for mobs by typing the name: Pig, Spider, Cave Spider, Silverfish, Magma Cube, Blaze, Skeleton, Zombie,...
- Flexible compatibility with some games: Directly import and export into Minecraft games. Moreover, you can import your minecraft building ideas into other games that allow third-party tools to edit behavior & resource packs: Crafting and Building, Eeskcraft, Craftsman, etc.

Translate and learn millions of words and expressions and express yourself as if you were a native speaker.

Reverso is the best tool for those who seek quality translation, looking to master a foreign language: reading, writing or speaking, and it's free.

Students, teachers, business professionals or others, whether beginners or advanced, use Reverso to learn new words or expressions, and eliminate the risk of being mistaken.

It provides you instant translations of the selected text when reading content on your browser, on Safari or any other app.
 
Reverso Context is based on data gathered from millions of real-life texts (official documents, movie subtitles, product descriptions) in both languages. These texts are processed with powerful "big data" algorithms and machine learning to provide you the best results. 

What do we mean by context? The search results (translation) of a specific word or expression are weaved within real-life sentences, so you will be sure to understand and learn exactly how the word can be used, and make no embarrassing mistakes.  

Just type or say the word or expression you wish to translate and the results will appear instantly:  relevant translations, presented with examples of how words are used in sentences.

The app offers flashcards and quizzes based on your search history and favorites to help you memorize them and to improve your language skills. Unlike standard learning tools, it focuses on words and expressions that you really need and want to learn.

The bits and bytes: 
* Instantly translate selected text when reading content on your browser, iBook or any other app, with no need to exit the app you are using. Click on the familiar "Share" option and select the Reverso option. 
* Translation in 17 languages: Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Russian, Romanian, Japanese, Turkish, Hebrew and Chinese, Korean, Swedish, Ukrainian and we are working on more.
* Advanced features include pronunciation, history, phrasebook of your favorites and more.
* Create vocabulary lists based on your personal selection of examples and translations. Lists remain available even when you’re offline. 
* Enjoy natural pronunciation of complete example sentences.
* One click to get translations, frequency details, and  conjugation when applicable.
* Search history, also available offline.
* Suggestions: words and expressions will be suggested to you as you type.
* Share your findings via email or social media.

Want to try your luck, randomly select someone from a group of people, sort teams and pairs, etc?
"Finger Chooser - Random Picker" is what you need.

- Chooser
Touch the screen with your friends and the app will randomly pick one of you.
You can set the number of people who wins. (From 1 to 4)
Accompanied by sounds and vibrations.

- Decision Roulette
Choose one of 10 roulettes and spin the wheel.
Roulette will help you make a choice (what to eat, what to play, what kind of pet to get, what to do, what country to visit, etc.)
Сolor the roulette sectors choosing from a variety of color themes.

- Lucky Arrow
Arrange people or objects around the phone and click on the arrow on the phone screen. 
After spinning, the arrow will select someone or something.
Customize it. Great variety of themes.

- Coin
Wanna flip a coin for a hard decision? Select your favorite coin, choose stylish background and tap the screen to try your luck. Coin rotates, wobbles like a real coin. Complete with sound effects and cool graphics!

- Tutorial
Clear video instructions for each randomizer (Chooser, Arrow, Coin)
